ArchlightTest.description: Checks whether linked interfaces have compatible directions.
ArchlightTest.name: xADL 3/Structures/Interface Directions Compatible
ArchlightTest.Prolog: compatible_directions('in', 'out'). compatible_directions('out', 'in'). compatible_directions('inout', 'inout'). compatible_directions('none', 'none'). test(Id, 'Connected interfaces have incompatible directions') :- link(L), id(L, Id), link_point1(L, P1), link_point2(L, P2), direction(P1, P1d), direction(P2, P2d), \+ compatible_directions(P1d, P2d). test(Id, 'Connected interfaces have incompatible directions') :- interfaceMapping(L), id(L, Id), interfaceMapping_innerInterfaceLink(L, P1), interfaceMapping_outerInterfaceLink(L, P2), direction(P1, P1d), direction(P2, P2d), P1d \= P2d.
